name: Pixel Cars: Xtreme Road Race 3D
description:
Beat your pixel opponents in this crazy road race! We glad to invite you to amazing racing championship in a magic pixel world, where everything is made from pixels! Take part in a racing fever and defeat your opponents in Pixel Cars: Xtreme Road Race 3D – extreme car driving simulator!

Remember all these old school racing game in 8 bit graphics? May be you were playing it on your video games player, or may be on your first PC. Now these game go to the new level! There are a lot of great drivers in this game, but you must to be the best. Good luck!

Pixel Cars: Xtreme Road Race 3D game features:
- Incredible low poly graphics;
- Real race simulator 3D;
- Different cars and tracks;
- Easy-to-use navigation.

Drive ahead and beat your racing rivals in Pixel Cars: Xtreme Road Race 3D challenge!
